actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Interior Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income grants paid by the U.S. Forest Service as a result of restricting motorized traffic in the Boundary Waters Canoe Area.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received by the taxpayer from the U.S. Forest Service as a result of restricting motorized traffic in the Boundary Waters Canoe Area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income grants paid by the U.S. Forest Service as a result of restricting motorized traffic in the Boundary Waters Canoe Area.
